title: Buddy
text: Based in Minneapolis and known primarily for his landscapes of rural and urban Minnesota, the paintings of Mike Lynch recall the works of the American Scene painters of the 1920s and 1930s (such as Edward Hopper) with their ethereal quality of light and muted tones.
description: old toy pickup truck at center on a table; three large boxes at L; two cylinders, one overturned, at R; pinks, browns and greys
